autoInstall: Automatic installation of games. (This will automatically start the installation process after downloading the game)
autoClean: Auto-clean game files after installation.{' '} //Not working//
hoverTitle: Show hover title on game icons (useful for long game names)
two_gb_limit: Limit the installer to 2GB of RAM. (It will be automatically on if you have 8GB or less)
hide_nsfw_content: Hide NSFW content. (This will hide all NSFW content from the launcher)
